message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you.  Given its value, I'm asking for $18,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but $18,000 is already a competitive price for a product of this quality. How about we meet in the middle at $16,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $15,000. I'm really interested in the product and I'm willing to make a deal at this price.
